SEARCH
Package org.eclipse.core.databinding.bind.steps

Class SetTwoWaySteps

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.core.databinding.bind.steps.SetTwoWaySteps
public final class SetTwoWaySteps extends Object
Contains Step interfaces for the fluent databinding API for two-way IObservableSet bindings. Each of these interfaces define the operations that are allowed in a particular pipeline step.
Since:
1.11
